en: to be in a moral disorder

ngiemboon: Nɔ̀ɔn pfɛ̌ɛ mmó tà lepfòm sé túbe.
en: The animal ate until its belly was bloated.
something beyond what was thought possible

ngiemboon: A nǎ nkáb né mèŋ tà ńzsé pɔ ngie à tǐɛ ntùbo, tá n te gyá.
en: He gave me money until I thought he had performed a miracle, but I didn't see it.
join the bamboos to make a clapper
